column5: Well guys here it is, my first report...... The plan was for me and couple of friends Paul & Kevin to go to the Rideau Falls and target the walleys...  The weather was nice and off we go at 5:30pm.... Got the boat launched at 5:45pm and fishing within minutes...  Did not take long, Paul hooks into a small eye   Then it's my turn...... a cat   Then it's Kevin's turn with another cat   The bitting was on and just could'nt believe catching so many fish on the Ottawa on a full moon Here is the rest of the fish we caught:                     And last but not least..... the biggest walley of the night.... 19" caught on a 1/4 oz jig, rigged with Gulp Alive 3" minnow grub chartreuse and live leech    All fish were released and total fish caught tonight was 7 eyes, 6 drums, unlimited rock bass and cats. Sure was a very good night to be out on the river
Excellent rapports Jacques!!!Belles Photo  Des bonnes Dore a Manger et des Mal-Achigan qui tires commes des bulldozer.  Bienvenue Mon Ami.  Mike the Pike
Great report! Gotta love em' walleye! keep it up,we love pics!
Sure was a good outing, nice work...
Great report Jacques! Sounds like an amazing night!
good report looks like you guys got into quite the mix of fish there  cheers!
Great report Jaques, thats alot of fish you got into., nice walleye at the end there too.
Thanks guys.... sure was a good night to be out on the water  Those drums sure put up a good fight..... when my friend Paul hook into those the rod bent in two and peeling line out like torpedos  LM
good report!  I bet a couple of those drum pulled a bit of drag.
Great report and pics!!!   You're flirting with disaster "bare handing" those Catfish don'tcha yanno!

FWF,  They sure did and my friend Paul thought he had hooked on a bigger fish   GCD,  I got stung a few times before and learned how to handle them..... it's the side barbs you got to watch  Thanks again guys Leechman
Nice report & great fishing too !!!!...good pics as well..gotta love that river fishin  cheers
Good to see you posting reports on here now.  Leechman eh?  Hope to see more and sure we will.  You gotta get your ski now!

Thanks Don.... Next time we go with Steve I'll try me best to hook one.... The closest I've been is the one that Paul (aka Bass Addict) caught and man did that beast put up a fight    We just might see you out there  Jacques aka Leechman
Very Impressive fishing you got there. With  alot of different species. Thanks for sharing!
Thanks JB.....The river holds many different species and when dropping a line in just don't what you'll be hookin.  Thanks again LM
